text:
Hi all :wave-yeti: rookie question here :baby-yoda: :
• How can I query `properties` for contacts using a GET on `/crm/v3/properties/contacts`
• But only return those which are custom / created by me?
Thanks in advance! :pray:

<@U05KPMCCG74>: I don't think it's possible there's no option to put filters based on property info (but it would be nice to have one); instead, you must list the custom properties you've created in comma-separated form and send them as parameters.

Maybe you should just query all props and and filter the json response to return only the property names where `HubSpotDefined` is false.

I could be wrong, but I don’t think the Quotes API currently supports e-sign related functionality. Taken from the docs:

_The following functionality is not currently supported when using the v3 quotes API:_
• _Creation of legacy or proposal quotes through the v3 API. Only the `CUSTOMIZABLE_QUOTE_TEMPLATE` template type can be used when creating quotes with the v3 API. Learn more about <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/quotes#associate-a-quote-template|associating quotes with quote templates>._
• _Creation or modification of quote templates. Quote templates must be created or customized within your HubSpot account before they can be referenced using the v3 quotes API._
• _*Usage of Esign*, Stripe payments, or HubSpot payments_
right, but I'm using HubSpot sdk for node v.9.. which I hope is not the same thing

Great, thank you <@U02P3JPAV3Q>. Do you know where I could pop this as a feature request?
My use case is that a team has been working on our HubSpot integration, and so I don't actually have a list of the custom properties as it stands... It would be a super useful feature!
<@U2H3TT8F2> do you have news?

The SDK is just a tool aimed at making interaction with the existing APIs you’ll find in the documentation easier and more intuitive. So you won’t be able to do anything these APIs don’t already allow for.

Looking through the release notes, I’m not seeing anything that would suggest the Quotes API has been opened up to allow you to configure e-sign related properties.

If you or someone else ends up discovering otherwise - I would be eager to hear.

Good morning folks,
Since a few minutes ago, I’m getting an error when I call `<https://api.hubapi.com/engagements/v1/engagements/recent/modified>`
This is the error I’m getting
```<Response [400]> {'status': 'error', 'message': 'Forwarding for permission filtering not implemented here' ```
Any idea what’s up ?
hey Duncan, I actually did this last night. It may not be perfect but I just filtered out every property that started with "hs_"

~This seems related to the sunset of the `contacts` scope~

edit: this is July 31s 2022

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Developer-Announcements/Upcoming-contacts-scope-sunset/m-p/656237>
~But I’m using a private app with the granular scopes so I’m confused on how this would impact me — a gap in the scope transition support ?~
same here

<@U04FYBV18UE> ? Have you been able to find something / get some support ? No luck on my side.
Our whole system is down because of this unfortunately
I’m trying to rush a patch using the v3 search API but it’s less powerful since I don’t get the associations as a result etc.
approached their support, but no answer yet
Got it — thanks
added the sales-email-read scope
and now its working
unfortunately im using Integromat for this call and their app is not able to add new scopes
but maybe you are using private apps
I just retried — it works now (without any scope change for me)
Yes I’m using a private app, and I had the sales-email-read scope
yes, its working now as before
no sure what happened here, but I guess they fixed it
If somebody who works at HubSpot has some kind of informal explanation that would help — wondering if I need to switch to v3 or if I can safely keep using v1

Fairly new to HubSpot api development.  I have a process to create a quote, associate line items to a quote.

How does everyone handle editing associated line items?   Do you look at what you have and compare? Or do you just delete what you have and add as if first time adding line items?
It’s broken again :laughing:
yep
FYI as of now it started working again…
